section.name: Maven java.net plugin
section.p: Built on top of java.net tasks library, this plugin provides a set of goals to assist projects hosted on java.net, such as:

ol.li: Deploy the Maven-generated web site to java.net.
Upload the distribution files to java.net.
Host the artifacts in the java.net Maven repository.

section.p: If you have suggestions about useful goals, or if you are interested in developing this plug-in, please let the owners know!
